doc.title: Malibu Rocki: Boobwatch 2
doc.plot: Sun, surf, and sex. From the beaches of Malibu to Zuma, like a pink tidal wave, the awesome Rocki Roads and her team of wet dream queens (Davia, Randi, Bunnie, and Nici) do it to it. From a heart-stopping mouth-to-mouth tongue bath, to a wild anal romp in the waves, to a three-way in the sheets, these dedicated lifeguards throw caution (and their clothing) to the wind to keep the beaches of Southern California the wettest and wildest on the planet!
